00038 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractFinisher {
00039 
00045         public function process() {
00046 
00047                 //set session value to prevent another validation or finisher circle. MailformPlusPlus will call only this Finisher if the user reloads the page.
00048                 session_start();
00049                 $_SESSION['submitted_ok'] = 1;
00050 
00051                 //read template file
00052                 if(!$this->templateFile) {
00053                         if (!isset($this->settings['templateFile'])) {
00054                                 t3lib_div::debug($this->settings);
00055                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::throwException('no_config_confirmation','F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation','templateFile');
00056                         }
00057                         $templateFile = $this->settings['templateFile'];
00058                         if(isset($this->settings['templateFile.']) && is_array($this->settings['templateFile.'])) {
00059                                 $this->templateFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($this->settings['templateFile'],$this->settings['templateFile.']);
00060                         } else {
00061                                 $this->templateFile = t3lib_div::getURL(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($templateFile));
00062                         }
00063                 }
00064 
00065                 //set view
00066                 $view = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Confirmation");
00067                         
00068                 //render pdf
00069                 if(!strcasecmp($this->gp['renderMethod'],"pdf")) {
00070                                 
00071                         //set language file
00072                         if(isset($this->settings['langFile.']) && is_array($this->settings['langFile.'])) {
00073                                 $langFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($this->settings['langFile'],$this->settings['langFile.']);
00074                         } else {
00075                                 $langFile = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($this->settings['langFile']);
00076                         }
00077                         $generatorClass = $this->settings['pdf.']['class'];
00078                         if(!$generatorClass) {
00079                                 $generatorClass = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_PDF";
00080                         }
00081                         $generatorClass = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($generatorClass);
00082                         $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent($generatorClass);
00083                         $exportFields = array();
00084                         if($this->settings['pdf.']['exportFields']) {
00085                                 $exportFields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$this->settings['pdf.']['exportFields']);
00086                         }
00087                         $file = "";
00088                         if($this->settings['pdf.']['export2File']) {
00089                                 //tempnam seems to be buggy and insecure
00090                                 //$file = tempnam("typo3temp/","/mailformplusplus_").".pdf";
00091 
00092                                 //using random numbered file for now
00093                                 $file = 'typo3temp/mailformplusplus__'.rand(0,getrandmax()).".pdf";
00094                         }
00095                         $generator->setTemplateCode($this->templateFile);
00096                         $generator->generateFrontendPDF($this->gp,$langFile,$exportFields,$file);
00097                                 
00098                         //render csv
00099                 } elseif(!strcasecmp($this->gp['renderMethod'],"csv")) {
00100                         $generatorClass = $this->settings['csv.']['class'];
00101                         if(!$generatorClass) {
00102                                 $generatorClass = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_CSV";
00103                         }
00104                         $generatorClass = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($generatorClass);
00105                         $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent($generatorClass);
00106                         $exportFields = array();
00107                         if($this->settings['csv.']['exportFields']) {
00108                                 $exportFields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$this->settings['csv.']['exportFields']);
00109                         }
00110                         $generator->generateFrontendCSV($this->gp,$exportFields);
00111                 }
00112 
00113                 //show TEMPLATE_CONFIRMATION
00114                 $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'CONFIRMATION');
00115                 $view->setSettings($this->settings);
00116                 return $view->render($this->gp,array());
00117         }
00118 
00119 }
